Download Accelerator Plus (DAP) is a popular software that accelerates the downloading speed and makes the process smoother and more reliable than any other free downloader available. It is an internet download accelerator that can increase download speeds up to 400% faster. DAP is easy to install and provides fast download speeds while avoiding any hiccups while downloading.

## Features

### Multi-channel Download

One of the most appreciated features of DAP is a multi-channel download. It splits a single file into several parts and downloads them individually. This feature increases download speed by utilizing several servers to download the file simultaneously.

### Video Downloading

DAP has an integrated video downloader, making it easy to download videos from popular video platforms such as YouTube, DailyMotion, Vimeo, and others. The software also supports video downloads from more than 1000 other websites with a single click.

### Built-in Browser

DAP includes a built-in browser to simplify the process of downloading a file. Users can access the download link directly from the browser, and no need to copy and paste the URL into the DAP window.

### Advanced File Management

Users can pause and resume their downloads at any time; the software will pick up from where the download was interrupted. DAP also has advanced file management features that segregate the downloaded files according to their file type and status, making the download operation organized and more manageable.

### Virus Checking

The software has an in-built feature that scans every downloaded file for viruses and malware. It provides an extra layer of security so that users can securely download files without any threat to their system.

## Conclusion

Download Accelerator Plus is packed with features that make downloading faster, more manageable and organized. It is a reliable and efficient tool that has become an ideal choice for many users over the years. DAP is the ultimate solution to all slow downloading modes, and it accelerates the speed to an unmatched range, giving you a smooth, hassle-free download experience.
